Learning_VendorObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_VendorObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_VendorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies the Learning Vendor to update. Leave blank when adding.

validation.validation: Name is required when creating a new Learning Vendor.
Enter a name that isn't already in use.
To inactivate this vendor, you must disable or remove any enabled learning instructors associated with it.

description: Contains detailed information about a Learning Vendor.
